message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this product. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider my counteroffer?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite a bit below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider my counteroffer?
